scripts.start-all: concurrently "cd auth/server && nodemon index.ts" "cd auth/client && npm start" "cd product/server && nodemon index.ts" "cd product/client && npm start" "cd cart/server && nodemon index.ts" "cd cart/client && npm start" "cd order/server && nodemon index.ts" "cd order/client && npm start" "cd main-app && npm start" "cd admin && npm start"
